mursa |red|
=====

**ᠮᡠᡵᠰᠠ** (IPA: [mur.sa]) is a random quote
fetching console utility. Written in Red.

|screenshot|

Installing
----------

+ Use latest pre-built binary from `releases <https://github.com/q60/mursa/releases>`__

Building and installing manually
--------------------------------

You need *Red* and *GNU make* to build **ᠮᡠᡵᠰᠠ**.

.. code-block:: sh

    make
    sudo make install

Running
-------

.. code-block:: sh

    mursa

Uninstalling
------------

.. code-block:: sh

    sudo make uninstall

.. |screenshot| image:: https://i.imgur.com/QG8pjwE.jpg
.. |red| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/-red-AE2528?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
